definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: Coal bed gas parameter well SPMT-1 is located at the Shiping well field, Guxu mining area, South Sichuan Coal Field.
sentences.chinese: 1号煤层气参数井位于川南煤田古叙矿区石屏井田。

sentences.english: Production system which control the CBM well output fluctuation is a key factor to ensure production successfully.
sentences.chinese: 排采制度是保证煤层气井生产排采成功的关键要素。

sentences.english: China has just started the study on coalbed methane (CBM) reserves.
sentences.chinese: 煤层气储量的研究工作才刚刚开始。

sentences.english: The principle of drilling well distribution and favorable blocks is recommended to develop CBM in Liujia Coal Mining Area.
sentences.chinese: 提出了该区煤层气开发的布井原则和有利区块。

sentences.english: The flow in the cleat system can be described by Darcy's law.
sentences.chinese: 煤层气在割理系统的流动遵循达西定律。

sentences.english: Application result of this method to simulating coalbed methane well in Xinji is reasonable.
sentences.chinese: 把该方法应用于新集煤层气井的拟合，取得良好效果。

sentences.english: Both coal gangue and coal bed methane are low heating value fuels.
sentences.chinese: 煤矸石和含甲烷量较低的煤层气均属于低热值的燃料。

sentences.english: Primary factors influencing the exploration of coal - bed gas in low rank coal basins are analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了影响低阶煤盆地煤层气勘探的主控因素。

sentences.english: Huainan coalfield is rich in coalbed methane resources and has large - scale coalmine methane drainage.
sentences.chinese: 淮南煤田煤层气资源丰富，煤层气抽采具备较大规模。

sentences.english: Huainan coalfield is rich in coalbed methane resources and has large - scale coalmine methane drainage.
sentences.chinese: 淮南煤田煤层气资源丰富，煤层气抽采具备较大规模。

sentences.english: Fracturing fluids and propping agents are the essential materials for CBM well fracturing to increase yield.
sentences.chinese: 压裂液和支撑剂是煤层气井压裂增产措施的基本材料。

sentences.english: Coal-seam gas is another form of unconventional gas supply.
sentences.chinese: 煤层气是另一种非传统天然气资源。

sentences.english: CBM will source and facilitate the quoting process and final sale of painted aluminum coil.
sentences.chinese: 煤层气将源和便利报价过程和涂铝线圈的最终销售。

sentences.english: The coal-bed gas (gas) is a kind of non-renewable resource.
sentences.chinese: 煤层气俗称瓦斯，是一种不可再生资源。

sentences.english: Hydrodynamic condition is one of the critical factors that affect low-rank coalbed methane (CBM) accumulation.
sentences.chinese: 水动力条件是影响低煤阶煤层气成藏的重要因素之一。

sentences.english: Air drilling and solid-free gelatin drilling fluid can be used in coal-bed methane drilling.
sentences.chinese: 空气钻进和无固相植物胶钻井液适合煤层气钻进。
